issue.title: Saving and loading cartographic context
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Goal is to save cartographic context through MAP component and:
* load it again for authenticated users
* display it inside MAP component with a specific link (i.e. http://www.myeasysdi.org/map?context=gfd8gdg4fgf0), even for public users

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

What about using Web Map Context from OGC ? shouldn't be better ?
Or are there some technical limitations ?
